name: The Ninja Saviors: Return of the Warriors
name_original: The Ninja Saviors: Return of the Warriors
description: NatsumeAtari's ultra-skilled game-smiths were responsible for bringing titles like Pocky & Rocky Reshrined, WILD GUNS Reloaded and more to consoles in the 90s and now they're back, better than ever, bringing Technostacy to modern gamers!
